channel.title: Zombie Apocalypse OFFICIAL release
channel.description:
I had to release this before fag "PlayRooney" released it again... [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/2127/titlek.png[/img] Zombie Apocalypse Everything you remember about delta, Has now been changed. Zombies. Guns. The Apocalypse! Ak47 and variants... lr300 and variants.. dragunov and variants...mp5 and variants.. colt 45 and variants.. uzi and variants... desert eagle.... tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! Soon to be:grenade, airstrike. [img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Weapons1.jpg[/img]
First off.... [size=15pt]this is completely based off Tatemo's Zombiescape.[/size] We have permission to make a source from his release [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/5623/proofpicturez.png[/img]
Some changes that have been made added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.) Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze) Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) more spawns to come. THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE! Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45 [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6689/zombie1arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95 [img]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/6163/zombie2arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6795/zombie3arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/3542/zombie4arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8741/zombie5arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185 [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6703/zombie6arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225 [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4499/fghhi.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/4291/fgjfhmujg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275 [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3167/gddfgdfg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315 [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/1449/dfgdhsdjh.png[/img] Notice how this one is bigger than the others?
Now you may be thinking "Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?" as they get stronger, they begin too....... "Mutate"
Name:Mutation Stage 2 Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355 [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7874/hfghfjf.png[/img]
Name:Mutation Stage 3Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400 [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5259/sfjsygherujhdszth.png[/img]
Name:Mutation Stage 4 Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800 [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3221/shdfhgf.png[/img]
Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:???? Max hit:????? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000 vary [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/4081/djhdgjdgf.png[/img] We are now looking for a new photographer anyne want to help ? :P [size=36pt]ZOMBIE HIVE[/size] There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge Room 1 (complete) Room 2 (complete) Room 3 (complete) Room 4 (complete) Room 5 (Complete) Video of the beta:
[size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size] now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:
0-49 = level 1 50-99 = level 2 100-199 = level 3 200-399 = level 4 400-799 = level 5 800-1599 = level 6 1600-2799 = level 7 2800-5600 = level 8 5600-11199 = level 9 11200-22399 = level 10 22400-44799 = level 11 44800-89599 = level 12 89600-179199 = level 13 179200-358399 = level 14 358400-716799 = level 15 716800-1433599 = level 16 1433600-2867199 = level 17 2867200-5734399 = level 18 5734400-11468799 = level 19 11468800+ = level 20
More pics and shit coming soon
~~~~To Come in V2~~~~ -Bugs and Glitches fixed -Higher stability -Army Armour -Special Ops Armour -Improved Combat -New Army bases Shit-Loads more but i really CBF posting at the moment
Enjoy Sincerely- Mursanari.

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse OFFICIAL release
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Roxee™:

Wow Murs, he tried to release? How about me and you only work on it now?

I didn’t “Try to release it” I did Release it and I got rid of it due to msur Bugging me on msn saying it would be embarssing to calll him australian and shit? and as i logged in this morning he spammed me to the shit house. he said he added heaps of stuff and fixed heaps up and reduced lag? he done nothing other then add objects and add npc’s and change the names…

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse OFFICIAL release
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

I had to release this before fag “PlayRooney” released it again…

Zombie Apocalypse
Everything you remember about delta, Has now been changed.
Zombies.
Guns.
The Apocalypse!
Ak47 and variants… lr300 and variants… dragunov and variants…mp5 and variants… colt 45 and variants… uzi and variants… desert eagle… tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! Soon to be:grenade, airstrike.

Weapons1.jpg512×631

First off…
[size=15pt]this is completely based off Tatemo’s Zombiescape.[/size]
We have permission to make a source from his release

Some changes that have been made
added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.)
Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze)
Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) more spawns to come.
THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE!
Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45

Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95

Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115

Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135

Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165

Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185

Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225

Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245

Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275

Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315

Notice how this one is bigger than the others?

Now you may be thinking “Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?”
as they get stronger, they begin too… “Mutate”

Name:Mutation Stage 2 Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355

Name:Mutation Stage 3Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400

Name:Mutation Stage 4 Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800

Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:??? Max hit:??? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000 vary

We are now looking for a new photographer anyne want to help ?
[size=36pt]ZOMBIE HIVE[/size]
There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge
Room 1 (complete)
Room 2 (complete)
Room 3 (complete)
Room 4 (complete)
Room 5 (Complete)
Video of the beta:

[size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size]
now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:

0-49 = level 1
50-99 = level 2
100-199 = level 3
200-399 = level 4
400-799 = level 5
800-1599 = level 6
1600-2799 = level 7
2800-5600 = level 8
5600-11199 = level 9
11200-22399 = level 10
22400-44799 = level 11
44800-89599 = level 12
89600-179199 = level 13
179200-358399 = level 14
358400-716799 = level 15
716800-1433599 = level 16
1433600-2867199 = level 17
2867200-5734399 = level 18
5734400-11468799 = level 19
11468800+ = level 20

More pics and shit coming soon

To Come in V2
-Bugs and Glitches fixed
-Higher stability
-Army Armour
-Special Ops Armour
-Improved Combat
-New Army bases
Shit-Loads more but i really CBF posting at the moment

Enjoy Sincerely- Mursanari.
